import React, { useState, Fragment } from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { connect } from "redux"; const CreateProfile = (props) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: "", website: "", location: "", bio: "", status: "", githubusername: "", skills: "", youtube: "", facebook: "", twitter: "", instagram: "", linkedin: "", }); const [displaySocialInputs , toggleSocialInputs] = useState(false); const { company, website, location, bio, status, githubusername, skills, youtube, facebook, twitter, instagram, linkedin, } = formData; const onChange = e => setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]: e.target.value}); return (

onChange(e)} /> Could be your own or a company website
onChange(e)} /> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
onChange(e)} /> Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
onChange(e)} /> If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{displaySocialInputs &&
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)}/>
onChange(e)} />

); }; CreateProfile.propTypes = {}; export default CreateProfile;
